mapper.insert: INSERT INTO request VALUES (null, #{memberId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{onOff}, #{price}, null, #{content}, NOW(), '대기중')
mapper.select: select * from request r left join img i on r.request_id = i.request_id and i.thumbnail = 1;

SELECT REQUEST_ID, R.MEMBER_ID, TITLE, IS_ONLINE, PRICE, R.ADDRESS, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, STATUS, CATEGORY_NAME, NICKNAME FROM request R INNER JOIN category C ON R.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN member M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM request_accept WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId} AND SOLVER_ID = #{solverId}

SELECT RA.REQUEST_ID, RA.SOLVER_ID, M1.NICKNAME as solverName , M2.NICKNAME as clientName, RA.STATUS, R.*, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM request_accept RA INNER JOIN request R ON RA.REQUEST_ID = R.REQUEST_ID INNER JOIN member M1 ON M1.MEMBER_ID = RA.SOLVER_ID INNER JOIN member M2 ON M2.MEMBER_ID = R.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN category C ON C.CATEGORY_ID = R.CATEGORY_ID WHERE RA.STATUS IS NULL AND R.MEMBER_ID = #{clientId}
mapper.update: UPDATE request_accept SET STATUS = 'accept' WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId} AND SOLVER_ID = #{solverId}
UPDATE request SET STATUS = '진행중' WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM request_accept WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM request_accept WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId} AND SOLVER_ID = #{solverId}
